content.query:
CREATE VIEW gold.vw_calendar
AS
SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://awadls5.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AW-Calendar/',
FORMAT='parquet') as q1;

GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_customers
AS
SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://awadls5.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AW-Customers/',
FORMAT='parquet') as q2;

GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_productSubcategories
AS
SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://awadls5.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AW-ProductSubcategories/',
FORMAT='parquet') as q3;

GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_products
AS
SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://awadls5.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AW-Products/',
FORMAT='parquet') as q4;

GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_returns
AS
SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://awadls5.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AW-Returns/',
FORMAT='parquet') as q5;

GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_sales
AS
SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://awadls5.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AW-Sales/',
FORMAT='parquet') as q6;

GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_territories
AS
SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://awadls5.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AW-Territories/',
FORMAT='parquet') as q7;
